mainHero.title: UNLEASH THE POWER OF
mainHero.subtitle: AI BASED EXPERIMENTATION
mainHero.description: Twinmo is revolutionizing the way companies develop products. With Testrunz, our AI-powered experimentation platform, businesses can accelerate every phase of product development, from discovery and innovation to compliance testing and manufacturing.

items.title: Testrunz
items.description: Introducing Testrunz, your streamlined solution for executing and tracking product experiments. Testrunz connects to industry-standard test instruments, providing real-time data, analyzing results, and generating reports.

items.title: Unity
items.description: Meet Unity, our advanced hardware module designed to interface with lab instruments and facilitate a seamless connection to Testrunz. With its 20-channel capacity for thermocouple, AI, DI, DO measurements and power product measurement features.

features.title: Latest & greatest
features.subtitle: Key Features
features.description: Here are some key features that Twinmo offers.

items.name: Test Library
items.description: Boost Efficiency with our Ready Test Library for Seamless Testing.

items.name: Inventory Test
items.description: Manage your workflows with test input and inventory system.

items.name: Auto Analysis
items.description: AI engine handles calculations, offers insightful analysis.

items.name: Live Test Charts
items.description: Real-time interactive charts for dynamic test insights.
